title: MA Yun (Jack MA) - 東京カレッジ

quotes:
Period of stay
May 1, 2024 - October 31, 2025
Jack Ma founded Alibaba Group in 1999
served as its executive chairman from 1999 to September 2019

Mr. Ma founded the Jack Ma Foundation in 2014
